NACK on those. Doxygen doesn't care about such white space. IIrc we already had this discussion.\n
If we really want this, shouldn't clang-format take care of those?\n
Do you want to add a CommentPragmas to enforce the space comprehensively? \n
If we added the CommentPragmas spacing then this would be taken care of as well I believe.\n

I don't think CommentPragmas support this. They are a [regular expression that describes comments with special meaning, which should not be split into lines or otherwise changed. ](http://clang.llvm.org/doxygen/structclang_1_1format_1_1FormatStyle.html#ab66e80203947743add360933aa7a2256)\n

<strike>Looks like cf is missing this feature...

We'd need to set `ColumnLimit` to not-null, to support this.
